EXTRACTED VALUE: A well-made, technically solid shooter, but its dedication to realism kills the fun. [Aug 2006, p.88]
As much as we love those menus, though, it bothers us that Madden 06 for the PSP, I mean Xbox 360, is missing so much content.
A streamlined but only fitfully entertaining role-playing game that requires deeper gameplay and story to justify doubling the standard XBLA price.
There's a good game in Quake 4, but it's buried under several layers of highly disappointing graphical performance issues.
